list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move or cause to move back and forth or from side to side while suspended or on an axis.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her long black skirt swung about her legs
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Váy đen dài của cô vung lên đôi chân của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move by grasping a support from below and leaping.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we swung across like two trapeze artists
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi vung lên như hai nghệ sĩ hình thang

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move or cause to move in a smooth, curving line.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the cab swung into the parking lot
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chiếc taxi vung vào bãi đậu xe

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: shift or cause to shift from one opinion, mood, or state of affairs to another.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: opinion swung in the Chancellor's favor
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ý kiến vung trong sự ủng hộ của thủ tướng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: play music with an easy flowing but vigorous rhythm.
(of an event, place, or way of life) be lively, exciting, or fashionable.
engage in group sex or swap sexual partners within a group, especially on a habitual basis.
a seat suspended by ropes or chains, on which someone may sit and swing back and forth.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: with the swing of her arm, the knife flashed through the air
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Với vung cánh tay của cô ấy, con dao lóe lên trên không trung

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the South's swing to the right
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: phía nam đu của bên phải

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a style of jazz or dance music with an easy flowing but vigorous rhythm.
(in musical theater) an understudy, typically one who covers multiple roles in the chorus of a particular production.
